        public GenericSparseModel<F,​G> copy()
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Make a copy of the mutable parts of the model. This makes a deep copy of the model. Some unmutable parts are not copied though.

        The type of the returned object MUST be assignable to this type.

        Specified by:

      • convert

        public <R extends GenericFactor> GenericSparseModel<R,​G> convert​(BiFunction<F,​Integer,​R> converter)
        Make a copy of the network while transforming the factors. All variable labels/ID will remain the same.
        Parameters:
        converter - a BiFunction that will take the source factor, the variable and return a new factor
        Returns:
        the new model

      • getSize

        public int getSize​(int variable)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Get the cardinality of a variable in the model.

        Asking the cardinality for an unknown variable has an unspecified result and might lead to exceptions. Implementations will defined the actual behaviour and outcome of an illegal request.

        Specified by:
        getSize in interface Model<F extends GenericFactor>
        Parameters:
        variable - the variable we are interested in
        Returns:
        the size/cardinality of the variable

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • addVariable

        public int addVariable​(int size)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Add a new variable to the model. Added variables will be appended to the model and the index of the added variable will be returned. Adding a variable will always return a value that is greater than any other variable in the model.
        Specified by:
        addVariable in interface Model<F extends GenericFactor>
        Parameters:
        size - - int the number of states in the variable
        Returns:
        int - the label/index/id assigned to the variable

      • getVariables

        public int[] getVariables()
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Returns a sorted array of all the variables stored in the model. The returned Variables must be sorted.

        Implementer must make sure that returned array could be modified and such changes must not affect the network or previously return arrays

        XXX is the sorting of the result needed. RemoveBarren does need it to be sorted!

        Specified by:
        getVariables in interface Model<F extends GenericFactor>
        Returns:

      • getFactors

        public Collection<F> getFactors()
        Specified by:
        getFactors in interface Model<F extends GenericFactor>
        Returns:
        all the factor of the model in a collection. Factors are ordered by variable. First factor is therefor for first variable.

      • setFactors
